msbt.message: Well, wellit's finally here. The day I've been waiting for. Festivale!Oh, pardon my exuberance. I just think this is a fabulous holiday. An excuse to dance and caper!

As amazing as Festivale dancing is, I must admit I'm just as smitten by the beautiful feathers in the air.Yet I'm not so skilled that I can dance AND swing my net to catch feathers at the same time. What to do!
I'm gathering feathers as Festivale mementos, yet I still haven't caught .If you happen across an extra later, perhaps we could arrange a trade? Think on it!
Well, look at YOU! All kitted out for Festivale. And in stunning fashion, I might addI could easily mistake you for a pro dancerso don't be surprised if you're called upon to perform!
, your outfit could not be more appropriate for Festivale! It's simply perfect for the occasion.I only hope the fabric lends itself to dancing and free movement. No excuses not to dance on Festivale!
Behold! This is a dance I mastered as a young .I say, that Pavé will have his work cut out for him if he expects to out-dance me, !
Isn't it heartwarming to see everyone on dancing away?It's as if the rhythm has the whole island in its grip. And nowI feel its irresistible pull! Dance with me!

Isn't the confetti a lovely touch for Festivale? It feels like the whole island is dressed up for the holiday.And I'd be remiss if I didn't alert you to the occasional rainbow feather sprinkled inThey're quite rare, so do take the opportunity to net one for yourself if you're able!
Ah, did my dance catch your attention, ?It's quite understandable. Once a highly trained dancer, always a highly trained dancer, !
How do you like my Festivale outfit, ? Feel free to use your most extravagant adjectives.Perhaps one might compare me to a beautiful flower in full blossom Merely a suggestion.
This is only the beginning of Festivale, darling. I, for one, will be dancing all day long!Do take note of my dance moves. I have opted NOT to trademark them so that all may share in their glory.
The best of Festivale is yet to come! Think you can keep up with li'l old me, ?
I suppose I do grow weary at this late hourweary of not finding a suitable dance rival!Won't someone challenge me to a dance-off?
I suppose you must be ready to head back outside to cavort further, hmm? And have me join you?I must confess that I'm a tad overheated at the moment. Let me cool my heels for a while longer.
Even from in here, I can FEEL the rhythms of Festivale calling to me. Oh, it's just my dancer's soul
You can't see it, but I am performing a most elaborate dance right now in my mindNot to worry. I'll demonstrate it for everyone later outside. No one will be able to look away!
I simply MUST know what sort of dancing is happening outside while I'm in here! You must describe it!Yes, I know I could go outside and see for myself. In due time.
I suppose I've talked up my dancing ability more than a little. You must be dying to see an exhibition!Wellfeast your eyeson how an elite dancerrests and recovers. It's very important, !
Rise and shine for Festivale, ! This is the time on when we dance!Call me an early if you must, but my dancer's blood simply COMPELS my body to move.
Did you feel the excitement in the air out there? Never fear—I will make my Festivale debut when I'm ready!I just need to wait for the perfect moment toemerge. And dazzle the island with my routine!

It's impressive to see the energy simply radiating from our island's Festivale celebrants tonightI used to be able to dance all day and all night And I STILL can!<10_4 /> With a few well-timed naps, naturally.
Oh! I can't help but notice that you appear to be in possession of I don't suppose you'd be open to trading for something of minelike ?
Sure, let's trade!
Sorry, not interested.
Apologies for being nosy, but I happened to notice that you have .Would you be an absolute darling and consider trading for my ?
Sure, let's trade!
Sorry, not interested.
Oh, that's splendid! Let's exchange items right away.
How fabulous! I'm ready when you are
Oh, you're my Festivale hero! Why, this is almost as much fun as dancing, isn't it?
That's a wrap. Thank you kindly! Perhaps we could trade again in the near future Think about it!
Oh dear. Well, yours to do with as you wish, .
I see. Very well, then. I won't beg.
Oh! You sure about trading of your for of my ?
Yep. Let's do it.
Actually, never mind.
